full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
### Solicitation Number: 202301656/A

#### Overview

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites bidders to submit a proposal for the provision of two (2) Organizational Design and Classification Consultants, each working on a part-time basis (100 days per year) for an estimated level of effort of 100 days per consultant, with an irrevocable option to extend the contract for up to four (4) additional one (1) year periods.

### Tender Details
- **Contract Period:** One year, with an option to extend for up to four (4) one-year periods
- **Estimated Level of Effort:** Two (2) Organizational Design and Classification Consultants @ 100 days each per year
- **Security Clearance:** Multi-level Security Clearance (FA2 & ERS) required
- **Trade Agreements:** Up to three (3) trade agreements apply (CETA, CFTA, and WTO GPA)

### Requirements
- **Category and Level of Service:** Level 3 Organizational Design and Classification Consultants (1.2) for services in the National Capital Region
- **Accreditation and Certification:** Suppliers must hold a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) for Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS)

### Submission Requirements
- **Submission Method:** Electronic submission of proposals
- **Document Requirements:** Proposals must be submitted in PDF format, per the provided templates
- **Language of Proposal:** Proposals may be submitted in either official language (English or French)

### Contact Information
- **Name:** Steve Lafontaine
- **Email:** steve.lafontaine@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
- **Phone Number:** 343-571-1180
- **Background Documents:** For more information, email or contact the contracting authority directly.

Note: Please familiarize yourself with the original document's formatting to retained it as close as possible, except avoiding unnecessary repetition. 

You can make the changes. The page limit for our technical writing task is 400 characters.

Please READ the instructions entirely before starting work. I may provide more context later. Best regards!
